items.name: n3wth
items.description: Flat, minimal, iOS-inspired design system for n3wth projects.

items.description: Tailwind CSS class merge utility

items.title: Button
items.description: Multi-variant button with responsive sizes, loading state, and asChild support.

items.name: badge
items.title: Badge
items.description: Inline badge with semantic color variants (sage, coral, mint, gold).

items.title: Input
items.description: Text input with glass variant, icon slots, and error state.

items.title: Icon
items.description: Icon wrapper around iconoir-react with named icon map and size presets.

items.title: Switch
items.description: Toggle switch with controlled/uncontrolled modes and size variants.

items.name: avatar
items.title: Avatar

items.name: separator
items.title: Separator
items.description: Horizontal or vertical visual separator.

items.name: progress
items.title: Progress
items.description: Animated progress bar with value label and semantic color states.

items.name: label
items.title: Label
items.description: Form label with required indicator and disabled state.

items.name: textarea
items.title: Textarea
items.description: Textarea with resize control and error state.

items.name: skeleton
items.title: Skeleton
items.description: Skeleton loading placeholder with text, circular, and rectangular variants.

items.name: code-block
items.title: Code Block
items.description: Lightweight syntax-highlighting code block with line numbers.

items.name: noise-overlay
items.title: Noise Overlay
items.description: SVG noise texture overlay for visual grain effect.

items.name: scroll-indicator
items.title: Scroll Indicator
items.description: Animated scroll-down indicator with label and position presets.

items.description: Animated hamburger-to-X SVG icon for mobile menu toggles.

items.name: animated-text
items.title: Animated Text
items.description: CSS-animated text with fade-up, fade-in, slide-up, and blur-in effects.

items.name: shape
items.title: Shape
items.description: Decorative SVG shape with pattern fills and responsive sizing.

items.name: character
items.title: Character
items.description: Expressive SVG character face with expressions and accessories.

items.name: speech-bubble
items.title: Speech Bubble
items.description: Speech or thought bubble with directional tail.

items.name: tooltip
items.title: Tooltip
items.description: Portal-based tooltip with auto-positioning and arrow.

items.name: card
items.title: Card
items.description: Card container with default, glass, and interactive variants.

items.name: nav-link
items.title: Nav Link
items.description: Navigation link with default, underline, and pill variants.

items.name: command-box
items.title: Command Box
items.description: Copyable command display box with clipboard support.

items.title: Theme Toggle
items.description: Dark/light theme toggle button with sun/moon icons.

items.description: Slide-in drawer for mobile navigation with focus trap.

items.title: Error Boundary
items.description: React error boundary with fallback UI and retry.

items.name: composite-shape
items.title: Composite Shape
items.description: Multi-layer shape compositions with preset configurations.

items.name: modal
items.title: Modal
items.description: Accessible modal dialog with portal, focus trap, and compound sub-components.

items.name: tabs
items.title: Tabs
items.description: Accessible tabs with underline and pill variants and animated indicator.

items.name: toast
items.title: Toast
items.description: Toast notification with variant styling and auto-dismiss.

items.name: dropdown
items.title: Dropdown
items.description: Accessible dropdown select with single/multi-select and search.

items.name: accordion
items.title: Accordion
items.description: Accessible accordion with single/multiple modes and animated content.

items.name: nav
items.title: Nav
items.description: Responsive navigation bar with desktop links, mobile drawer, and theme toggle.

items.name: footer
items.title: Footer
items.description: Site footer with link columns, social icons, and copyright.

items.name: hero
items.title: Hero
items.description: Hero section with badge, title, description, and CTA buttons.

items.title: Section
items.description: Layout section wrapper with size, spacing, and container options.

items.name: use-theme
items.description: Theme toggle with localStorage persistence and system preference detection.

items.description: SSR-safe media query matching with breakpoint helpers.

items.name: use-reduced-motion
items.description: Detects prefers-reduced-motion and provides animation config defaults.

items.name: use-keyboard-shortcuts
items.description: Declarative keyboard shortcut handler with modifier key support.

items.name: use-toast
items.description: Toast notification system with context provider and variant helpers.

items.name: use-count-up
items.description: Animated number counter with scroll-trigger support.

items.name: use-scroll-reveal
items.description: Scroll-triggered entrance animations with directional options.

items.name: use-stagger-list
items.description: Staggered list item cascade animations.

items.name: use-page-transition
items.description: Page entrance/exit fade-and-slide animations.

items.name: use-text-reveal
items.description: Character-by-character text reveal with scroll trigger.

items.name: use-button-pulse
items.description: Subtle hover/press scale animations for buttons.
